meta.group_description: Configure and respond with server FAQs.

add.description: Add a new FAQ entry for this server.

params.question: Question to match against member messages.
params.answer: Answer to send when the question is recognised.

enable.description: Enable or disable automatic FAQ responses.

params.enabled: Should automatic FAQ responses be enabled?

list.description: List configured FAQs for this server.

add.limit_reached: Your current plan allows up to {limit} FAQs. Upgrade to {plan} for additional capacity.

list.empty: No FAQs have been configured yet.
list.overflow: Showing first 25 FAQs. {remaining} more entries not displayed.

response.title: Helpful FAQ Answer
response.description: {user}, I found a matching FAQ answer (confidence {confidence}%).
